content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Stone, which is now in my inventory alongside the 20 units of Iron Ore.
# With the Stone collected, I can now craft a Stone Furnace, which will allow me to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates.

# I will proceed to craft the Stone Furnace now.

ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Ensure that I have the materials to craft the Stone Furnace.
stone_furnace = craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft the Stone Furnace. 

# After crafting, I will check my inventory to confirm that the Stone Furnace is available. 
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display the inventory after the crafting attempt.
